headline: Ask HN: Can I respond to an old Ask HN?
description:
Hi,

I bookmarked a while ago this thread: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=29606476 with the intent, that if I'm going to Munich again, I'd maybe propose meeting up for lunch (I have bit of a similar background as the OP).

I'm going to Munich next week and wanted to follow up on my idea. Responding to that old thread seems to be disabled (HN policy?). Can I resurrect commenting or reach out to OP somehow?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 我是否可以回应一个旧的 "询问HN"？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 我是否可以迴應一箇舊的 "詢問HN"？
description_zh-Hans:
嗨，

我不久前把这个主题加入了书签：https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=29606476

我下周要去慕尼黑，想跟进一下我的想法。回复那条老线似乎被禁止了（HN政策？） 我可以重新发表评论或以某种方式与OP联系吗？
description_zh-Hant:
嗨，

我不久前把這個主題加入了書籤：https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=29606476

我下週要去慕尼黑，想跟進一下我的想法。回覆那條老線似乎被禁止了（HN政策？） 我可以重新發表評論或以某種方式與OP聯繫嗎？
